Find us: Home > Diet > Special Diets > Cholestorol Diet > Cholesterol Drugs Fast Food Pharmacy: Pop a Pill with Your Big Mac Cholesterol Drugs Fast Food Pharmacy: Pop a Pill with Your Big Mac By Tasha Gerken on Mar 29, 2011 Tweet FYI Health Tip
Why not take a pill to prevent the cholesterol-raising effect of your favorite fast food burger and fries?
